Q.1. WHAT IS YOUR ARMY RANK OR GRADE*  1. PRIVATE 2. PRIVATE FIRST CLASS 3. TECHNICIAN 5TH GRADE OR CORPORAL 4. TECHNICIAN 4TH GRADE OR SERGEANT 5. TECHNICIAN 3RD GRADE OR STAFF SERGEANT 6. TECHNICAL SERGEANT 7. MASTER SERGEANT OR FIRST SERGEANT 0. NO ANSWER

Q.5. WHERE WERE YOU LIVING MOST THE LAST FIVE YEARS OF YOUR LIFE BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY*  1. ON A FARM OR IN THE COUNTRY 2. IN A SMALL TOWN (FEWER THAN 2,500 PEOPLE) 3. IN A TOWN (WITH BETWEEN 2,500 AND 25,000 PEOPLE) 4. IN A CITY (BETWEEN 25,000 AND 100,000 PEOPLE) 5. IN A LARGE CITY (MORE THAN 100,000 PEOPLE) 0. NO ANSWER
Q.6. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE ARMY*  1. 1 YEAR OR LESS 2. 1 YEAR TO 2 YEARS 3. 2 YEARS TO 3 YEARS 4. 3 YEARS TO 4 YEARS 5. OVER 4 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER
Q.7. IN GENERAL, WHAT SORT OF A TIME DO YOU HAVE IN THE ARMY*  1. I HAVE A PRETTY GOOD TIME 2. IT,S ABOUT FIFTY-FIFTY 3. I HAVE A PRETTY ROTTEN TIME 0. NO ANSWER
Q.8. DO YOU FEEL PROUD OF YOUR COMPANY*  1. YES, VERY PROUD 2. YES, FAIRLY PROUD 3. NO, NOT PROUD 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.9. IN GENERAL, HOW WOULD YOU SAY YOU FEEL MOST OF THE TIME, IN GOOD SPIRITS OR IN LOW SPIRITS*  1. I AM USUALLY IN GOOD SPIRITS 2. I AM IN GOOD SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME AND IN LOW SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME 3. I AM USUALLY IN LOW SPIRITS 0. NO ANSWER
Q.10. ON THE WHOLE, HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE ARMY*  1. I LIKE THE ARMY VERY MUCH 2. I LIKE IT FAIRLY WELL 3. I RATHER DISLIKE IT 4. I DISLIKE THE ARMY VERY MUCH 0. NO ANSWER
Q.11. ON THE WHOLE, HOW IS THE MORALE OF THE MEN IN YOUR COMPANY*  1. VERY HIGH 2. FAIRLY HIGH 3. JUST SO-SO 4. FAIRLY LOW 5. VERY LOW 0. NO ANSWER
Q.12. ON THE WHOLE, HOW IS YOUR OWN MORALE*  1. VERY HIGH 2. FAIRLY HIGH 3. JUST SO-SO 4. FAIRLY LOW 5. VERY LOW 0. NO ANSWER
Q.13. IN GENERAL, HOW WELL DO YOU THINK YOUR COMPANY IS RUN*  1. IT IS RUN VERY WELL 2. IT IS RUN PRETTY WELL 3. IT IS NOT RUN SO WELL 4. IT IS RUN VERY POORLY 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.14. IN GENERAL, WHAT SORT OF PHYSICAL CONDITION ARE YOU IN AT THE PRESENT TIME*  1. VERY GOOD PHYSICAL CONDITION 2. GOOD PHYSICAL CONDITION 3. FAIR PHYSICAL CONDITION 4. POOR PHYSICAL CONDITION 5. VERY POOR PHYSICAL CONDITION 0. NO ANSWER
Q.15A. DO YOU THINK YOU HAVE AS MUCH OF A PERSONAL STAKE IN THIS WAR AS ANYBODY ELSE*  1. YES 2. NO 3. I THINK SO, BUT I,M NOT SURE 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 15B NOT CODED.

Q.16. HOW IMPORTANT A PART DO YOU THINK YOUR COMPANY IS PLAYING IN WINNING THE WAR*  1. A VERY IMPORTANT PART 2. A FAIRLY IMPORTANT PART 3. NOT A VERY IMPORTANT PART 4. NOT IMPORTANT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

Q.17. WHAT WOULD YOU LIKE TO SEE HAPPEN TO THE GERMANS AFTER THE WAR*  1. PUNISH THE LEADERS, BUT NOT THE ORDINARY GERMAN 2. MAKE THE ORDINARY GERMAN PEOPLE SUFFER PLENTY 3. WIPE OUT THE WHOLE GERMAN NATION 0. NO ANSWER

Q.18. WHAT WOULD YOU LIKE TO SEE HAPPEN TO THE JAPANESE AFTER THE WAR*  1. PUNISH THE LEADERS, BUT NOT THE ORDINARY JAPANESE 2. MAKE THE ORDINARY JAPANESE PEOPLE SUFFER PLENTY 3. WIPE OUT THE WHOLE JAPANESE NATION 0. NO ANSWER
Q.19. HOW MANY OF YOUR COMPANY OFFICERS TAKE A PERSONAL INTEREST IN THEIR MEN*  1. ALL OF THEM DO 2. MOST OF THEM DO 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM DO 4. FEW OF THEM DO 5. NONE OF THEM DO 0. NO ANSWER

Q.20. DO YOU FEEL THAT YOUR COMPANY OFFICERS KNOW WHAT YOU ARE ABLE TO DO*  1. THEY HAVE A GOOD IDEA OF WHAT I CAN DO 2. THEY HAVE SOME IDEA OF WHAT I CAN DO 3. THEY KNOW LITTLE OR NOTHING ABOUT WHAT I CAN DO 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.21. HOW MANY OF THE NON-COMS IN YOUR COMPANY HANDLE THEIR JOBS AS WELL AS ANYONE ELSE THAT COULD BE PICKED FROM YOUR COMPANY*  1. ALL OF THEM 2. MOST OF THEM 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM 4. FEW OF THEM 5. NONE OF THEM 0. NO ANSWER

Q.22. HOW SATISFIED ARE YOU ABOUT BEING IN YOUR PRESENT ARMY JOB INSTEAD OF SOME OTHER ARMY JOB*  1. VERY SATISFIED 2. SATISFIED 3. VERY DISSATISFIED 4. DISSATISFIED 5. IT DOES NOT MAKE ANY DIFFERENCE TO ME 0. NO ANSWER

Q.23. ON THE WHOLE, DO YOU THINK THE ARMY IS GIVING YOU A CHANCE TO SHOW WHAT YOU CAN DO*  1. A VERY GOOD CHANCE 2. A FAIRLY GOOD CHANCE 3. NOT MUCH OF A CHANCE 4. NO CHANCE AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.24. DO YOU THINK A SOLDIER WITH ABILITY HAS A GOOD CHANCE FOR PROMOTION IN YOUR COMPANY*  1. A VERY GOOD CHANCE 2. A FAIRLY GOOD CHANCE 3. NOT MUCH OF A CHANCE 4. NO CHANCE AT ALL 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.25. WOULD YOU SAY THAT MOST OF THE MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT USUALLY PUT ALL THEY HAVE INTO THEIR ARMY DUTIES, OR DO THEY USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET BY*  1. MOST OF THE MEN USUALLY PUT ALL THEY HAVE INTO IT 2. MOST OF THE MEN USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET BY 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.26. HOW ABOUT YOU YOURSELF - WOULD YOU HONESTLY SAY THAT YOU USUALLY PUT ALL YOU HAVE INTO YOUR ARMY DUTIES, OR DO YOU USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET BY*  1. I USUALLY PUT ALL I HAVE INTO IT 2. I USUALLY WORK JUST HARD ENOUGH TO GET BY 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.27. EVERY SOLDIER MUST HAVE A CERTAIN AMOUNT OF TRAINING. IF IT WERE UP TO YOU, WHEN WOULD YOU MOST LIKE TO HAVE YOUR TRAINING*  1. SAME AS IT IS NOW 2. FOUR EVENINGS A WEEK, ONE HOUR EACH NIGHT 3. TWO EVENINGS A WEEK, TWO HOURS EACH NIGHT 4. TWO FULL DAYS EVERY MONTH 5. A WHOLE WEEK EVERY THREE MONTHS 6. SOME OTHER WAY 0. NO ANSWER
Q.28. IS THERE ANY KIND OF TRAINING WHICH YOU THINK YOU SHOULD BE GETTING MORE OF*  1. YES, WE NEED MORE TRAINING 2. NO, WE GET EVERYTHING WE NEED 0. NO ANSWER
Q.29. IS THERE ANY KIND OF TRAINING WHICH YOU THINK YOU ARE GETTING TOO MUCH OF*  1. YES, WE GET TOO MUCH 2. NO, WE NEED EVERYTHING WE GET 0. NO ANSWER
Q.30. IF IT WERE UP TO YOU, WHAT KIND OF OUTFIT WOULD YOU RATHER BE IN*  1. IN A FIGHTING OUTFIT 2. IN A NON-FIGHTING OUTFIT, BUT NEAR THE FRONT 3. IN A NON-FIGHTING OUTFIT HERE 0. NO ANSWER

Q.31. IF YOU COULD HAVE YOUR CHOICE OF STAYING ON THIS ISLAND OR BEING STATIONED ON SOME OTHER ISLAND IN THE PACIFIC WHICH WOULD YOU CHOOSE*  1. I WOULD MOVE TO ANY OTHER ISLAND IN THE PACIFIC JUST TO GET AWAY FROM HERE 2. I WOULD MOVE TO SOME OTHER ISLAND IF I COULD CHOOSE THE ISLAND 3. I WOULD NOT WANT TO MOVE TO ANY OTHER ISLAND IN THE PACIFIC 0. NO ANSWER

Q.53. IN GENERAL, DO YOU THINK THE TOWN PEOPLE OVER HERE TREAT YOU BETTER OR WORSE THAN THE TOWN PEOPLE DID BACK ON THE MAINLAND*  1. THEY TREAT US BETTER OVER HERE 2. THEY TREAT US ABOUT THE SAME OVER HERE 3. THEY TREAT US WORSE OVER HERE 0. NO ANSWER

Q.54. HOW DO YOU USUALLY FEEL ABOUT THE ARMY FOOD YOU ARE GETTING*  1. IT IS USUALLY GOOD FOOD AND WELL COOKED 2. IT IS USUALLY GOOD FOOD BUT POORLY COOKED 3. IT IS USUALLY POOR FOOD, BUT WELL COOKED 4. IT IS USUALLY POOR FOOD AND POORLY COOKED 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTIONS 55, 56 AND 57 NOT CODED.
